summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the drainage and wastewater system of The City of Seattle, Washington; adopting a system or plan of additions and betterments to and extensions of the drainage and wastewater system; authorizing the issuance and sale of drainage and wastewater revenue bonds for the purposes of paying part of the cost of carrying out that system or plan, providing a reserve, refunding a portion of the City's outstanding drainage and wastewater revenue bonds and paying the costs of issuing and selling the bonds authorized herein; providing for the terms, conditions, covenants and manner of sale of those bonds; describing the lien of those bonds and creating certain accounts of the City.
committee: Water Resources, Solid Waste and Public Health
